description:
The anime centers on para-athletes who all meet an outcast sports scientist named Ren Narita. The anime has four stories about four different sports: wheelchair basketball, track and high jump, goalball, and paralympic swimming.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Athletics
tags.description: Centers around sporting events that involve competitive running, jumping, throwing, or walking.

tags.name: Real Robot
tags.description: Prominently features mechanical designs loosely influenced by real-world robotics.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Basketball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of basketball.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Swimming
tags.description: Centers around the sport of swimming.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Handball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of handball.

name.native: ランズベリー・アーサー

node.description:
[Website](http://buglug.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RR_BugLug)

BugLug is a Japanese visual kei band formed in 2009.

__Members:__
- Vo. [Issei](https://anilist.co/staff/153819)  (一聖, ex.カルト → 納豆'ｓ(仮) → Beauty army) 
- Gt. Kazuki (一樹, ex.Luna de miel (as Kazuki) → るう゛ぃえ → Ruvie → Beauty army)
- Gt. Yuu (優, ex. Night baLon as vocalist → るう゛ぃえ → Ruvie → Beauty army)
- Ba. Tsubame (燕, ex.るう゛ぃえ (as つばめ) → Ruvie → Beauty army)
- Dr. Masaumi (将海, ex.クロルシアン (as 将) → Dizon (as 山本将) → Azel (as 露亜) → ジュリエット)

Issei is the vocalist of visual kei band [BugLug](https://anilist.co/staff/153810). 

__Birth Date:__ May 7

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/buglug_issei/)

Issei is the vocalist of visual kei band [BugLug](https://anilist.co/staff/153810). 

__Birth Date:__ May 7

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/buglug_issei/)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/miyukisugasuga)

Formerly affiliated with [Studio DEEN](https://anilist.co/studio/37/Studio-DEEN).

_Note: Not to be confused with [菅原美幸](https://anilist.co/staff/269024/Miyuki-Sugawara)._
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/212266/)._

[Website](http://buglug.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RR_BugLug)

BugLug is a Japanese visual kei band formed in 2009.

__Members:__
- Vo. [Issei](https://anilist.co/staff/153819)  (一聖, ex.カルト → 納豆'ｓ(仮) → Beauty army) 
- Gt. Kazuki (一樹, ex.Luna de miel (as Kazuki) → るう゛ぃえ → Ruvie → Beauty army)
- Gt. Yuu (優, ex. Night baLon as vocalist → るう゛ぃえ → Ruvie → Beauty army)
- Ba. Tsubame (燕, ex.るう゛ぃえ (as つばめ) → Ruvie → Beauty army)
- Dr. Masaumi (将海, ex.クロルシアン (as 将) → Dizon (as 山本将) → Azel (as 露亜) → ジュリエット)
